Slots
From the Penny Parlor to the High Limit Room, Table Mountain Casino slot players have it all with 2,000 slot machines to choose from. As a bonus, Mega Mountain Jackpots are available on every one of our slot machines! These random jackpots pay up to $150,000 or add Free Bonus Play anytime you play, just by using The Club Card!
Our casino floor is always filled with the newest, most unique, and most popular video, reel, poker, and keno slots with player favorites like Wheel of Fortune, Double Blazing 7’s and Queen of the Nile!
Michael Jackson
Michael Jackson King of Pop Slots
A Real Thriller. Relive Michael's greatest performances with surround sound, high-def visuals featuring classic MJ Dance Moves, and Thrilling Progressive Slot Play.
Reel Edge Slots
We're one of only 10 casinos in the country to have the new Reel Edge slots! Be one of the first to play these thrilling skill-based games!
Cashman Fever
Mr. Cashman is back, and he’s better than ever! Cashman Fever™ brings the excitement to a scorching hot new level. Cashman Fever is a feature-rich, highly entertaining experience with four red-hot, high-frequency Cashman Fever bonus features and an exclusive Cashman Fever Progressive Link feature that offers 20 jackpot pools.

Spice it up with a game that delivers more action – and more heat!
More Hearts
With free games and a pulse-pounding bonus feature, what’s not to love about this one?
